description: This file defines a Flutter widget for a payment screen, enabling users to select a payment method, initiate payment via an asynchronous service call, and display payment results or errors.

classes.name: PaymentScreen
classes.description: A stateful widget representing the payment interface, accepting arguments for booking ID and amount.

classes.name: _PaymentScreenState
classes.description: The state class managing user interactions, payment submission logic, and UI updates.

methods.name: _submit
methods.description: Handles the payment submission by calling the PaymentsService, updating UI based on success or failure, and showing confirmation or error messages.
